storyName: The Witch and Her Afternoon Tea
storyInfo: Nymph and Pohl split up to investigate the last residential district. Along the way, Nymph visits Qalaiša, the Northwind Witch, who has recently moved in. While Qalaiša is away, Nymph becomes trapped in a strange dream of the witch's past. In her efforts to retrieve the revenant fragment, she accidentally destroys Qalaiša's hut.

attributes.content: Where am I?
Hey—
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hey—
attributes.name: Faint Echo

attributes.content: How did I get here?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: My hand...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Pink patterns have formed on her hand. Blood has frozen into crystal, tearing the skin apart, and forcing its way out along the patterns.
A chill wind blows past, tearing blood and flesh like flower petals, leaving behind only—
It hurts... why...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Half an hour ago...
I'm sorry, Nymph, I hate to rush you like this.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: But I won't have peace here until these revenant fragments are back where they belong.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Master and Wiš'adel have been fighting constantly. They sound crazier than the ancestors in the furnace!
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Ermi... I've practically combed every inch of Kazdel, but I just couldn't find the remaining fragments.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Please, I'm counting on you. What about that slum kid who was with you?
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: He ran the number of households in this area against how fast we walked and figured that we had to split up to check everything before sundown.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: We split it down the middle. He said he had some repairmen on his side with sticky fingers, and he wanted to take the opportunity to teach them a lesson.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I hope he's not putting himself in danger... but I'm sure he can handle it.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hey, come on, it was just a few questions. Why the weapons?
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: You can't expect to run a dirty operation without facing the music. And I never said I was gonna report you to the Military Commission... Alright, if it's just the two of you, I could use the exercise.
attributes.name: Pohl
Pohl
attributes.content: What? Those guys are with you too? Er, how many are there? Twenty? Thirty?

attributes.name: Pohl
attributes.content: Um, is it too late for negotiations?
Do you think a revenant would miss the Furnace after a few days and go home on his own?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Are you even listening to yourself?
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Would you want to go back to the place where you were held prisoner for centuries?
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: It's just an idea... I don't know what it's like in the Furnace.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: You know, maybe Kazdel is a kind of furnace, too. People outside think it's scary and terrible, but it's home to us.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: It's hard to imagine being imprisoned for hundreds of years when I've been around for less than twenty. Maybe you're in a better position to judge, Ermi.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I wouldn't carry on down this topic if I were you, Nymph.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Heheh...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: You really are something else, Nymph. Probably no one else in Kazdel who would think like that but you, our kindest Djall.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Huh? What'd I... (Sniffs) ...Do I smell herbal tea?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Oh, I remember now! Qalaiša's place is right over there. Should we pay her a visit?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph! We have more urgent business, remember?
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: Right, uh, I was suggesting we go ask about the revenant fragments... who said anything about berry cookies? Are the fragments not urgent business?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Fine... But don't take too long.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: It's a wonder you get along so well with Qalaiša, though.
attributes.name: Ermengarde

attributes.content: She's wonderful! She always gives me little presents when I visit. Why is everyone scared of her?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Oh, but I can't go empty-handed, official business or not!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Let me see. She only moved in recently. What would be a good housewarming gift...?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Knock, knock. With one hand behind her back, Nymph knocks on the slightly damp door with the other.
Are you home, Qalaiša?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Oh, hello, Nymph.
Just a second while I get the door.
Good afternoon, Qalaiša!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I didn't have time to prepare a gift, but I hope you like this anyway.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I remember you said you wanted some flowers to cover up the smell of herbs in the house.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Oh, careful of the mud, I picked them with the roots so you can plant them in your garden.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: A pair of hands, fair as ivory, takes the flowers. Blue petals fall upon her gloves like the patterns of fine embroidery.
Blue snowdrops... can Kazdel's barren soil nurture such beauties now?
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Thank you, Nymph. I'll place this gift in the finest vase.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Glad you like it!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I didn't know they were called blue snowdrops.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I'm delighted that you came to visit, Nymph, but unfortunately, I'm about to head out.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Oh, you're busy? Is this a bad time? I'll—
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Not at all. Just a small errand. It shouldn't take more than a few minutes. You can wait here.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Just don't touch anything while I'm out.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Some things are... not ready, or suitable, to be presented. Promise me?
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: I promise! I won't touch anything. My parents taught me manners.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Good girl.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Nymph sits down by the desk. The warm candlelight is like a fragile barrier against the shadows from the corners and the roof.
A faint, acidic scent wafts from the herbs hanging from the roof beams. The wooden cabinets by the wall stand like coffins, guarding secrets that must never see the light of day.
Whew, my heart's racing for some reason.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: What's that creaking sound? Is there a musbeast in the walls?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph gulps. She feels a chill run up her spine.
She keeps glancing at the window, but the daylight outside seems to grow darker every time she does.
Her heart races with an unusual rhythm. The Djall touches her chest, and feels a trembling—box.
Oh, it's just the detector.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Wait!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: It wasn't reacting when I was outside. Could the fragment be in this house?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: My back's starting to hurt from sitting too long. I should stretch my legs. It's alright if I just took a look around, isn't it?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: This way? That way? Up there? It's not under the floor, is it?
attributes.name: Nymph
Nymph
attributes.content: There! The signal's getting stronger...

attributes.name: Nymph
attributes.content: Ouch!
Where did this cabinet come from? Was it here all along?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Oh no, I knocked something off!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Qalaiša is gonna think I messed with her stuff! I've got to put it back...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Surely it's fine to put back something that fell on the floor?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph bends down and feels for the blurry shadow in the darkness.
A strange sensation strikes her fingertips. She lifts the shadow, revealing a garland of branches, thorns, and mossflower, with snowdrops still mixed in.
(In Ancient Sarkaz) Snow?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Nymph feels her heart skip a beat upon saying the ancient Sarkaz word, like the chill she gets when an actual snowflake falls on her palm.
She stares at the garland in her hand, resisting the urge to put it on.
The room seems to shrink and darken, until it's almost suffocating. The sound of breathing in her ear grows heavier, but is it her own, or from... behind her?
The branches entwine with her hair, and the thorns pierce her palm. Nymph silently counts, then turns slowly but resolutely to look behind her—
Please take it.
Huh?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: You—when did you... who are you?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Please take it...
Please take... it...
The walls of the hut fall and the roof is gone. I find myself in the wilderness, the chaos of battle coming from beyond the dust.
The garland in my hand has turned to blood, spilling through my fingertips.
A bloodied nachzehrer crawls toward me, but I cannot move.
Help... me... Master...
Who are you?!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Tell the Liege... the King of Sarkaz is dead. Yliš has fallen.
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: Why... do we still fight?
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: I hear the ancient Sarkaz language, disjointed syllables that come together to form words—
'King', 'Death', 'Fight'.
I try to ask him where we are, but my words slip away from my lips, turning to faint echoes in the sky.
Where am I?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: The end of the battlefield... the boundary between life and death...
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: Why do you not grant me your blessing, Master? Do you despise my cowardice too?
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: Grant me the pain of decay, grant me the continuation of life... take this power away.
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: Please take it...
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: He pulls out a rotten object from his chest and places it in my hand.
His visage contorts from pain. His eyes are a mixture of reverence, fear... and hate.
G-get it away from me!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I don't want it! Help!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I understand... this is not a blessing, but punishment for my desertion.
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: Please... Master Qalaiša.
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: You called me... Qalaiša?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Wait, why is my hand acting on its own?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Is this a trick, Qalaiša? Stop it!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I raise my hand at the broken figure, but the hand I see is wrapped in bandages soaked with dried blood.
A tattered cloth brushes against the deserter's helmet. The scent of decay flows out, tearing away at what remains of his reason, filling his husk, bringing... life.
I feel a daze, then hunger. I bestowed strength on my weakened kin, becoming stronger in the process.
Without speaking, I hear a familiar voice in my head.
Cast down your weapon, deserter, and leave my battlefield.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: As you wish, Master.
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: He casts down his heavy armor, piece by piece, revealing terrifying wounds through gaps in the cloth that shrouds him.
The blood seeping out of his body coagulates instantaneously, like new skin.
Have you seen snow before?
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: The sound of the word is peculiar, but I understand what it means.
It has been so long since it last snowed in Kazdel, many have forgotten how to pronounce the word.
I killed an Ursine and cleaved open his chest. I watched as he died, but he didn't seem to feel any pain, repeating only a single word over and over.
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: (Saying the Ursine word for snow)
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: It must be something that removes the pain. Have you seen snow, Master?
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: Pain is the shadow of strength, and life is the sun. I cannot see snow under the scorching sun.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: You're afraid of pain, but not of death?
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: But why we live in... nay, it is not my place to say.
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: I should go, Master.
attributes.name: Dying Nachzehrer

attributes.content: Go north, and don't come back.
attributes.name: Familiar Voice

attributes.content: The scene before me fades into the distance. I am rapidly moving away from the ground, and toward the battlefield.
I see helmets clash and swords strike against armor. I see the shadow of death looming over Kazdel.
Where am I?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hey—
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hey—
attributes.name: Hollow Echoes

attributes.content: How did I get here?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: My hand...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Pink patterns have formed on my hand. Blood has frozen into crystal, tearing the skin apart, and forcing its way out along the patterns.
A chill wind blows past, tearing my blood and flesh like flower petals, leaving behind only—
It hurts... why...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Come.
attributes.name: Gentle Voice

attributes.content: Give me your hand.
attributes.name: Gentle Woman

attributes.content: Qalaiša?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: She holds my hands tightly and recites an incantation that I have never heard before.
I see clear droplets of water hanging from her eyelashes. Perhaps it is melted snow.
Phew—
attributes.name: Gentle Woman

attributes.content: She exhales and lets my hands go.
The comforting warmth is still there. I spread my palms open—
The patterns and wounds are no longer there, replaced by a pair of blue butterfly wings, which flap and disappear into the snowfield.
Is this real?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Yes, it is. Come, I'll tell you on the way.
attributes.name: Gentle Woman

attributes.content: Qalaiša...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Have we met before? It's alright, you may call me the Northwind Witch here.
attributes.name: Gentle Woman

attributes.content: I think you're the first Nachzehrer I've seen since I came here.
attributes.name: Northwind Witch

attributes.content: Nachzehrer? I...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I've sensed your presence ever since you set foot on the snowfield. You are growing weaker, like a campfire buried under snow.
attributes.name: Northwind Witch

attributes.content: A Nachzehrer who turns from war inevitably grows weak, a process that is even more painful than waiting for the approach of death.
attributes.name: Northwind Witch

attributes.content: So, why did you do it?
attributes.name: Northwind Witch

attributes.content: She throws the question at me casually, like kicking up a puff of loose snow.
But the question feels so heavy I can only gasp for air. Words fail me.
Was it because of 'that' war?
attributes.name: Northwind Witch

attributes.content: The Liege, nay, Nezzsalem, had no choice. And you...
attributes.name: Northwind Witch

attributes.content: You had to take the opposite path, as I did.
attributes.name: Northwind Witch

attributes.content: We're here.
attributes.name: Northwind Witch

attributes.content: Behind a cracked boulder lies a small patch of ice where wind and snow cannot reach. Beneath this ice, the water remains calm, cradling a round air pocket like a sorrowful eye.
The Northwind Witch cracks the edges of the icy surface with her staff, and the air pocket escapes, becoming one with the wind and snow again.
I came across this place by chance. The musbeasts won't drink from it, even if they're dying of thirst.
attributes.name: Northwind Witch

attributes.content: This spring does not grow or diminish, its water always clear. It exists on its own, outside of this snowfield.
attributes.name: Northwind Witch

attributes.content: I once bandaged myself by this spring, but later discovered that immersing in it was far more effective.
attributes.name: Northwind Witch

attributes.content: Like, you bathe in it? I've heard that workers on the mobility layer bury barrels in the ground to bathe, but it's so cold here...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: The water is not deep. You can hold my hand, if you're afraid.
attributes.name: Northwind Witch
Nymph
attributes.content: Alright, I... I guess I'll try.

attributes.name: Nymph
attributes.content: Eek!
I step slowly into the spring. The cold penetrates the armor and bandages that do not belong to me, piercing my every bone.
The water covers my shoulders and presses against my heart.
Qalaiša, no, Northwind Witch... do you remember encountering a dying Nachzehrer deserter, a long time ago?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Northwind Witch

attributes.content: Did he ever see the snow?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I heard he died on his way to the north.
attributes.name: Northwind Witch

attributes.content: But he saw the snow, at least, didn't he?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: No. He may never have seen it, but the snow was always inside him.
attributes.name: Northwind Witch

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: The heartbeat gradually slows and I can hear the sound of snowflakes falling on my head in between the rhythm.
The festering wounds and old scars continue to sting. The withered flesh and blood will never flourish again. But none of it matters anymore.
The pain has not lessened. It simply exists in another form now, like snowflakes that melt in the icy spring.
Qalaiša... is this really a dream?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: If it is, who did you make it for?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: What do you want to tell them? Your past, your future... or who you really are?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Qalaiša does not answer. She sits by the shore, her staff laid sideways on her legs.
I see a blue-purple butterfly fly past her hair.
One after another, they encircle the icy spring, turning the decay in me into new butterflies as they flap their wings.
Crystalline butterflies surround her. Her fingertips drop down to brush the surface of the water, but there is no ripple.
The snow stops and I suddenly realize that so too has this dream.
Is the dream over?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Qalaiša? Can I leave now?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: You're scaring me. I could really use some hot tea right now...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: ...Qalaiša?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: In the darkness, I sense something approaching, but whatever it is is not alive.
I try to curl up but cannot sense my limbs or torso. It is as if only my consciousness is left.
(Malicious sounds)
attributes.name: Presence in the Dark

attributes.content: I feel... fangs. I sense... hunger.
I arrive... beyond the end, before the door.
Qalaiša, help! I shouldn't have touched your stuff, I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Qalaiša!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Cold engulfs me again and fear rushes into my throat. Just as I am certain I will drown, the door opens.
Come in.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: You have rejected the title that the Military Commission conferred upon you, Qalaiša.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: Do you know what you have turned down? A war that we have yearned for too long.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: The blood of the old days will not be washed away. Don't tell me you really intend to leave with that house? The Liches will never allow you to leave with their handiwork...
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: Why is there a Djall here?
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: Er... hello... my liege?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Are you... King Nezzsalem? I read about you in my textbooks...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: The tall Nachzehrer bends down toward me. I cannot tell whether he is observing, listening, or trying to discern my scent.
Why have you come? She has not polished this memory, nor connected it to other things.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: I-I don't know. One minute I was in an ice spring with her and the next thing I know I'm here.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Um, what do you by not connected to other things?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Qalaiša deserted her war, but never her kind.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: She preserved her memories... for her kin, for reasons unknown.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: Perhaps she discovered a new path in the endless icefields...
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: Do you mean we're in Qalaiša's memories?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Do you know how I can leave? How do I wake up from this dream?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Time has no meaning here. No one can know when you will wake up, or if deeper slumber awaits.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: Then... are you real, or a version from Qalaiša's memories?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: It does not matter.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: The life of Nezzsalem matters not. The name of Nezzsalem is synonymous with war.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: But it has been a long time since I talked to someone like this.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: Okay, maybe we can chat until I wake up...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Has the war for Londinium ended, Djall?
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: Yes... I suppose. But I don't think you'd like how it ended...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: Surely I would have passed on, but Kazdel and the Sarkaz will remain...
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: The Patriarch of the Nachzehrer stays silent for a long time, as though he has forgotten I am here.
A-Ahem!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Maybe we could, er, talk about something else?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: Is it turnip season?
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: Huh? Oh... not a lot of people plant them these days. Most people plant maize and sweet potatoes.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: You're into food? I know a lot about that!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I mean... maybe not Nachzehrer... food...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: ...Go on.
attributes.name: Nachzehrer King

attributes.content: I'm back.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: I left a pot of herbal tea on the stove outside before I went out. It's just about ready now.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Get the tea set out, Nymph. The one with the pink roses is for you...
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Nymph?!
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: The tray slips from the Northwind Witch's hand, and she only has time to grab the scalding teapot. The tray shatters on the floor, but she simply stares in horror at the table—
The garland of branches, thorns, and mossflower lies beneath the dim candlelight. The Djall is gesturing excitedly to it, as though roasting sweet potatoes in furnace ash.
It's even sweeter than honey when it's fresh out of the furnace! Worth the blisters it gives you.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Oh, look at me, I just keep talking about myself. What about you? What's your favorite food? Sauteed turnips?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Oh, sweet potatoes might be your next favorite? Just give me a minute, I'll fetch a few from the furnace for you.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Qalaiša! You're back! Hey, when did I wake up?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: What's going on? Nezzsalem...?
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Nymph stares blankly in front of her, then looks down at her hands, before looking to the Northwind Witch with teary eyes.
Q-Qalaiša! I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry! I won't touch your stuff again!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Ouch! Hot! Why are you standing here with a teapot in your hands?
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Why do you think?
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: How did you get to my unfinished trinket in the time it took for me to pick a few flowers from the garden...? You even got... him out.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Tell me what happened.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Th-The revenant detector started reacting as soon as I walked in. I felt like I had to look around a bit.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: I never meant to put it on, but it's like my hands weren't my own.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Then I had a scary dream. One moment I was you, flying all over the battlefield. Then I was in an ice spring with you. Then a monster almost ate me!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Those are dreams that I made with my own memories to help Nachzehrer veterans cope after returning from war. They haven't been fully tested yet. They're dangerous!
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Thank goodness you weren't hurt. I'm not leaving you alone in this house ever again, and you can forget about today's berry cookies, if you can't keep your hands to yourself!
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: I really didn't mean to put it on! But there was some sort of power compelling me. I thought you were playing a trick on me!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Could it be the revenant fragment you were talking about? No wonder the hut hasn't felt quite right these past few days. I thought it had indigestion or something...
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: The Northwind Witch puts down the teapot, walks around the room, then looks up at the center of the roof.
I gave you a choice, revered ancestor.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: You can mock me with my memories and my house...
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: But if you disrespect my guest...
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Shadows surge out from the corners of the house, as if wanting to devour the two.
But a pair of eyes, cold as ice, delivers its ultimatum.
Then...
The eyes close, and ice-blue witchcraft begins to spread through the space—
Are you gonna talk or not?
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: Stop! You're gonna twist my arm off.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Artificer

attributes.content: Looks like you're the easiest of them to break. Good, saves me the effort.
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: One more time. Are you sure you didn't see it?
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: How was I supposed to see where your thing fell in the middle of the night?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Artificer

attributes.content: Anything like that would make a bang when it crashed, but we didn't—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Artificer

attributes.content: Thanks. See you later.
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: —Wait, I want to know what the *Sarkaz swearing* happened too!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Artificer

attributes.content: Nymph? Are you okay? Nym—
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: Did you find your fragment?
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: I did!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: The box closes with a click, and Nymph jumps down from the rubble, raising her handy box in triumph.
Aren't I awesome? I already have so many!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Yes, quite. I already had that fragment under my witchcraft but it was your 'awesome' arts that brought it down, along, with, my, house!
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: (Slow clap)
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Sorry... that was the shadow I saw in my nightmare, and I lost control of my Arts because I was scared.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: But I heard Nezzsalem say your hut was made out of Lich Arts? I happen to know a Lich...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: (Gulps) P-Please, Qalaiša, why are you suddenly looking at me like that, you're scaring me...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: What else did he tell you?
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Funny you should bring that up, because I don't recall giving you permission to go over my memories.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: I-It was an accident...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: And you wasted perfectly good tea, and berry cookies...
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Excuse me—what's going on, Nymph? Did you find the fragment?
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: You're a friend of Nymph's? Yes, she found her fragment, but I'm afraid she's busy at the moment.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: You're... Madam Qalaiša, right?
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: So... what's she busy with?
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: She angered the ancestors and wrecked my house. So now she has to fix it before she can go.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: But I thought your house walked into Kazdel and survived cannon blasts from bandits... Could Nymph really have wrecked it alone?
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: Em? What was that?
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Oh, er, nothing, nothing at all, ma'am.
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: Would you like some tea? I poured it right before she blew the roof off.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: Er, I appreciate the offer, but I'm good...
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: Keep at it, Nymph. Just a few more piles of rubble left and you're good to go.
attributes.name: Qalaiša

attributes.content: I'm starving...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: (Whimper) My berry cookies...
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Another one. I wasn't even looking and I already spotted four safety hazards on my stroll...
attributes.name: Odd Passerby

attributes.content: Such a poorly designed junction of pipes is incredibly vulnerable to changes in the Furnace's power output. You're basically looking at a potential explosion.
attributes.name: Odd Passerby
Odd Passerby
attributes.content: Well, good thing the old timers in the furnace don't have to stay in there much longer. Hopefully, by then they'll...

attributes.name: Odd Passerby
attributes.content: Flower petals? Where did these come from?
Blue snowdrops, huh? I used to plant them back in Columbia. I didn't think they could grow in Kazdel.
attributes.name: Odd Passerby

attributes.content: Times sure are a-changing...
attributes.name: Odd Passerby

attributes.content: Beep—Beep—Beep—Beep—
What's that? A... Djall?
attributes.name: Odd Passerby

attributes.content: That's the guy! The detector is going nuts!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: It's really loud. It's not going to explode, is it?
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: There must be a huge revenant fragment on this guy!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Stop pulling at my sleeve! It's a bespoke coat!
attributes.name: Odd Passerby

attributes.content: This guy-It's a living armor!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Living armor? Ha, haven't met such a rude little girl since the K'uk'ulkan.
attributes.name: Odd Passerby

attributes.content: He's starting to talk gibberish... the revenant must have possessed him. Pohl, hold the box for me!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: You want to stuff the whole guy in? I don't think your box is big enough.
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: Here—goes!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Hey, get this box off my head before I lose my temper!
attributes.name: Odd Passerby

attributes.content: Huh? Why are you also in the box? And why are you in pieces?
attributes.name: Odd Passerby

attributes.content: He's making a run for it!
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: I'll tie his hands!
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Stay put! Your big head's gonna break the box! I don't need Ermi getting mad at me again.
attributes.name: Nymph

attributes.content: Let's get him to the furnace, quick.
attributes.name: Pohl

attributes.content: Heheh.
attributes.name: Odd Passerby

attributes.content: They are a-changin' indeed.
attributes.name: Odd Passerby
